tap_foot_pad.description: Tap the foot pad lightly to test its sensitivity.

clean_foot_pad.description: Thoroughly wipe the foot pad to remove all dust and dirt.

interact_with_footpad.description: Press the foot pad once to check its functionality.

press_footpad.description: Press the foot_pad to open the lid.

apply_pressure.description: Apply certain pressure to the foot pad to check its resistance.

swipe_foot_pad.description: Swipe the foot pad to check it's surface condition.

verify_lid_status.description: Ensure the trashcan lid is in the open position.

secure_and_clean_lid.description: Close and wipe the lid after verifying that it is currently open.

secure_lid.description: Close the trash can lid by pushing it to a closed position.

close_lid.description: Close the trashcan lid by swinging it to the closed position.

push_lid.description: Push the opened lid to closed position.

clean_opened_lid.description: Clean the opened lid from inside.

test_lid_movement.description: Open and close the lid to test its smooth operation.

dirty_lid_maintenance.description: Open and wipe the lid if it is currently closed.

inspect_lid.description: Open the trash can lid by swinging it to an open position and then close it.

open_lid.description: Open the trashcan lid by swinging it to the open position.

close_lid.description: Ensure that the trashcan lid is in the closed position.

raise_lid.description: Raise the closed lid to open position.

check_lid.description: Check the lid if it is tightly closed.

clean_closed_lid.description: Clean the closed lid from outside.

basic_cleaning.description: Wipe the entire trashcan including the body, foot pad, and lid.

lid_maintenance.description: Open the lid, wipe it clean, and close it again as part of regular maintenance.

full_maintenance.description: Perform full maintenance including opening and closing the lid, cleaning the body and foot pad, and pressing the foot pad.

dust_trashcan_body.description: Dust the trash can body to remove any light dirt or dust.

clean_footpad.description: Wipe the foot pad to ensure it is free from any dirt or blockages.

maintain_trashcan.description: Maintain the cleanliness of the entire trash can including the body, lid, and foot pad.

clean_trashcan_body.description: Clean the trashcan body to remove dirt and debris.

clean_whole_trashcan.description: Clean the entire trashcan, including the body, lid, and foot pad

clean_full_trashcan.description: Perform a full cleaning of the trashcan including the body, lid and foot pad.

lid_manoeuvre.description: Perform a full manoeuvre with the lid by opening and closing.

clean_body.description: Clean the main body of the trashcan.
